Agregar guiad, base de uy de google que es armada por umad  y countrycode




```{r, echo = FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(tidycovid19)
vd <- tidycovid19_variable_definitions
ds <- tidycovid19_data_sources
data_info <- dplyr::left_join(vd, ds, by = c(var_source = "id"))
p <- data_info[, 1:3]
p %>%
  kable() %>%
  kable_styling()
```
